prompt: The agent was in a loop, repeatedly analyzing the situation without taking actions to progress towards the victory condition. The agent had previously attempted to deposit to farms 1 and 3. The goal was to break the loop and get the agent to execute actions that will progress towards the victory condition.
completion:
I realized the agent was stuck in a loop, repeatedly analyzing the situation. I considered that the previous actions were to deposit to farms 1 and 3, and I decided to add those to pending transactions to avoid repeating them. I also decided to add a short-term task to checkPendingRewards to get the agent unstuck.

I succeeded in adding a short-term task to check pending rewards for farms 1 and 3. This action was taken to get the agent unstuck from the loop. Next time I would consider adding more tasks to address the root cause of the loop if the initial task does not resolve the issue.
